definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The audiences enjoyed the moon and the lanterns while solving the riddles in a relaxed way.
sentences.chinese: 中秋夜人們將謎條張貼在各種花燈之上，賞月猜謎。

sentences.english: The amount of power people use goes up and down, but it stays above a certain level all the time.
sentences.chinese: 人們的耗電量忽上忽下，但總會在一定水平之上。

sentences.english: It is supposed to look like a sunset or sunrise with clouds over water.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫作看起來就像是大海之上雲霧縈繞的日出日落。

sentences.english: By loading doubting operator D on a proposition, we obtain a doubting proposition.
sentences.chinese: 將懷疑算子D加於命題之上就構成懷疑命題。

sentences.english: Create a new layer above it.
sentences.chinese: 新建一個圖層在它之上。

sentences.english: A national flag is always flown higher than other flags.
sentences.chinese: 國旗永遠都要升於別的旗幟之上。

sentences.english: John spent his weekends messing around in his boat on the Taihu River.
sentences.chinese: 約翰週末坐在船上泛遊在太湖之上。

sentences.english: For some stars both culminations take place above the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 有些星星兩個中天都出現在地平之上。

sentences.english: Other factories have spread like wild flowers among what were once rice fields and fish farms.
sentences.chinese: 大量的廠房像野花一樣盛開在原來的稻田和漁場之上。

sentences.english: The Emperor Mingdi of the Eastern Han Dynasty dreamt of a golden man flying over the palace.
sentences.chinese: 東漢明帝夢見一個金人飛行於宮殿之上。

sentences.english: The spirit that hovers over the chaos in Genesis 1, that refers to the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 《創世紀》第一章盤旋在混沌之上的靈，指的是聖靈。

sentences.english: The materialistic pattern of life is one in which money predominates over everything.
sentences.chinese: 真正的拜金主義生活方式是讓金錢凌駕於一切之上。

sentences.english: It is where yugoloths cavort on endless volcanic slopes .
sentences.chinese: 在那裏尤哥羅斯魔活躍於無盡的火山斜坡之上。

sentences.english: High above, in the soft blue, a lone star still sparkles.
sentences.chinese: 蒼穹之上，柔藍之中，一顆孤星仍在閃爍。

sentences.english: If you likejmaking love at midnight, in Network the dunes of the cape.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡雲雨纏綿在那午夜的海角沙丘之上。

sentences.english: While treading water, one does not push down on the water.
sentences.chinese: 當你做踩水動作時，你不會從水面之上向水下壓水。

definition: Shangdu, also known as Xanadu, summer capital of the Yuan Dynasty (1279-1368)
to tower/to stand straight (of person's bearing)
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
